turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order a venti vanilla sweet cream cold brew with half the amount of syrup from Starbucks for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Which location would you like for me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please place the order at the store located at Evergree way and Airport Rd.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. When would you like the order ready by?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please have it ready for me in and hour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want someone to have it picked up for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I will pick it up myself.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Was there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I also want a grande americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want room for cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want two packets of the Raw sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. One more thing, I would like a venti iced water as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So to repeat, you want a venti vanilla sweet cream cold brew, a grande americano, and a venti iced water. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I'll make sure that will be ready for you to pick up in an hour.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.
